channel.title: Software on nuaNce's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Software on nuaNce's blog

item.title: Some of My Favorite Software
item.description: Just a list of some software I find nice to use: Software Description **dash Fast and powerful POSIX shell giph Customizable and easy to use GIF recorder maim Extremely powerful CLI screenshot tool SXIV “Simple X Image Viewer” birch Freenode IRC client written in bash **herbe Simple, yet DBus free notifications farge Simple Colorpicker written in bash ungoogled-chromium Browse safely and google-free, no compromises ST Simple Terminal shfm Terminal file browser written in posix shell cchat-gtk GTK+ frontend for cchat cfm Simple and fast terminal file manager epy Terminal based Ebook reader wpm Command line typing test **wmutils Very extensible set of WM utilities
